fact_list.fact_text: Any vehicle parked in this zone may have its wheel clamped.
Any vehicle parked in this zone may be towed away.
Vehicles should comply with the Expressway Rules after the start of the expressway.
Vehicles should slow down and drive within the speed limit of the road at the end of the expressway.
Drivers should slow down and stop if necessary to give way to blind people crossing the road.
